City of Gresham Development Code 
 
(07/15) 
 
ARTICLE 5 OVERLAY DISTRICTS 
SECTION 5.0000 PURPOSE AND AUTHORITY 
 
General 
5.0001  Overlay Districts  
 
General 
5.0001  Overlay Districts  
An overlay district is a special purpose district that may be combined with any land use district.  The regulations 
of an overlay district shall be supplementary to the regulations of the underlying land use district and the 
regulations of the overlay district shall prevail if there is a conflict.  The following are overlay districts: 
1. 
Floodplain Overlay District 
2. 
Hillside and Geologic Risk Overlay 
3. 
Historic and Cultural Landmarks Overlay District 
4. 
Reserved 
5. 
Open Space Overlay District 
6. 
Gresham Butte Scenic View Overlay District 
7. 
Natural Resource Overlay
